content:
PTP CEO Mark Hardiman

PETALING JAYA: Port of Tanjung Pelepas Sdn Bhd (PTP), a joint venture between MMC Group and APM Terminals, has appointed Mark Hardiman as its new chief executive officer, effective Jan 2, 2024.

In a statement, PTP said Hardiman will succeed Marco Neelsen, who steps down from the role after seven years at the helm since 2016.

Hardiman was formerly chief executive officer at Port of Salalah, Oman, it said.
